carouselItems.description: The easiest way to gift something sweet this season.
carouselItems.title: Holiday Boxes

cookies.name: The Cookie That Stole Christmas
cookies.description: A jolly green cookie, bursting with holiday cheer, frosted with a tiny heart to bring joy near. Merry and bright, a festive delight, a cookie to make your season just right!

cookies.name: Chocolate Crumb Cookie ft. OREO®
cookies.description:
A warm chocolate cookie mixed with OREO® cookie pieces, topped with smooth vanilla cream cheese frosting, and sprinkled with more OREO® cookie pieces.

OREO is a trademark of Mondelēz International group, used with permission.

cookies.name: Holiday Red Velvet Sandwich Cookie
cookies.description: Two luscious red velvet cookies sandwiching a swirl of velvety vanilla cream cheese frosting and white chocolate ganache peeking through a star cutout.

cookies.name: Candy Cane Brownie Cookie
cookies.description: A deliciously rich chocolate candy cane cookie topped with smooth peppermint buttercream, chocolate ganache, and crunchy candy cane pieces.

cookies.name: Peanut Butter Cup Cookie ft. REESE'S
cookies.description:
A classic peanut butter cookie topped with a pool of melted peanut butter chips, drizzled with gooey milk chocolate, and sprinkled with REESE’S Peanut Butter Cups.

REESE’S trademark and trade dress are used under license.

cookies.name: Eggnog Tres Leches Cake
cookies.description: A light, fluffy vanilla cake soaked in eggnog-flavored tres leches sauce, topped with whipped cream, and sprinkled with a layer of cinnamon.

cookies.name: Milk Chocolate Chip Cookie
cookies.description: The classic—you can't go wrong. Thick, soft, and packed with milk chocolate chips.

common.a_network_error_occurred_please_check_yo: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
common.an_unexpected_error_occurred_please_cont: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support if the error persists.
common.calories_contact_note: For other allergy or nutritional information, please contact a manager at your store or contact the support team at https://crumblcookies.com/contact
common.calories_note: 2,000 calories a day is used for general nutrition advice, but calorie needs may vary.
common.calories_serving_note: *Calorie counts are per serving. Serving size varies based on product.
common.crumbl_drinks_charger_subtitle: Great if you're looking for a boost of energy in your day. Made with a Red Bull® Energy Drink base, these caffeinated drinks deliver a unique and flavourful experience!
common.crumbl_drinks_cooler_subtitle: A classic water base with fruit flavourings to create a refreshing and hydrating treat.
common.crumbl_drinks_soda_subtitle: A carbonated soft drink selection for a sweet sip! Crumbl Sodas feature various pop bases with added flavourings and ingredients to craft a delicious drink.
common.crumbl_experience_blurb: Level up your Crumbl experience with our award-winning app! Download now for a sprinkle of sweetness with every tap.
common.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your custom soda?
common.didnt_get_a_code_try_again: Didn't get a code? Try Again
common.dirty_soda_subtitle: Crumbl Dirty Soda offers 40+ delicious craft beverages—plus the freedom to create your own flavour concoction! Served in our signature Pink Cup.
common.download_app_description: Download the Crumbl App to start mixing! The most loved concoctions might even be added to a future Crumbl Drinks menu. Don't forget to show off your Crumbl drink order on social media and tag us for an extra chance to be featured!
common.error_401_description: Sorry, you are not authorized to access this page.
common.error_404_description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.
common.error_500_description: Sorry, we ran into an error and could not complete your request. Try to refresh this page, or feel free to contact us if the issue persists.
common.failed_to_rename_description: Please be respectful and avoid using offensive language.
common.food_allergy_text:
Our cookies are made onsite and may come into contact with different allergens during production. Please be advised that any of our products may contain allergens including peanuts, tree nuts, milk, eggs, wheat, soy, and sesame.

For additional nutritional information, please visit crumblcookies.com/nutrition.
common.getting_dessert_subtitle: No need to leave the car—Crumbl Dirty Sodas can be delivered curbside for ultimate convenience! Just place your order in advance on the Crumbl App, pull in, and we’ll bring your Crumbl Dirty Soda straight to your car.
common.illustration_milk_chocolate_chip_cookie: An illustration of a milk chocolate chip cookie
common.make_sure_date_is_correct: Please ensure the order date is correct.
common.marketing_cookies_text: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
common.max_retries_exceeded_try_again: Max retries exceeded. Please try again later.
common.my_vouchers_description: View your vouchers and redeem them on your next order.

common.no_vouchers: You don't have any vouchers yet.
common.on_it: We've been notified and we're working on it!
common.overwhelming_traffic_description: We are experiencing overwhelming traffic at the moment and online ordering is temporarily unavailable. Please visit one of our stores in-person, or try again later. Sorry for the inconvenience!
common.please_sign_in_to_earn_rewards: Please sign in to earn rewards
common.say_hello_to_your_new_favourite_drinks_t: Say hello to your new favourite drinks!
common.share_your_popular_drink_subtitle: Download the award-winning Crumbl App to make ordering and customizing your Dirty Soda even easier!
common.sip_on_repeat_subtitle: Choose from 40+ flavour combinations on our menu or customize your drink to be exactly how you like it! Crumbl offers Crumbl Sodas, Chargers, and Coolers to suit your taste and match whatever you desire to quench your thirst. Find the menu on the order page for your store!

common.you_have_reached_the_maximum_number_of_l: You have reached the maximum number of login attempts. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
common.your_browser_does_not_support_the_video_: Your browser does not support the video tag.
common.your_login_session_has_expired_please_re: Your login session has expired. Please request a new code and try again.
common.your_new_pop_shop_subtitle: Crumbl Dirty Sodas are yours to customize! With an offering of bold, fizzy, fruity, creamy, and customizable concoctions, you'll find something refreshing every time! Using real fruit, cream, flavoured syrups, sugar-free syrups, and more, each of our 40+ flavours makes this pop shop your new favourite spot.

home.cover_your_cookies_text: Introducing the delicious spinoff of the #1 Amazon bestselling card game, Cover Your Assets. Check it out at your local Crumbl store today!
home.crumbl_craving: Whether you need dessert delivery*, curbside pickup, or something else, we make it easy to order cookies online and through the app.
home.crumbl_cream_info: Take our award winning cookies and transform them into ice cream. Our Crumbl Cream is made with the finest ingredients for the most delicious ice cream you've ever had.
home.earn_loyalty: Earn Loyalty Crumbs toward FREE cookies with the Crumbl App!
home.franchise_store_jobs_text: Apply to work at a Crumbl store near you.
home.franchising_text: Be your own boss. Become a franchise and open your own store!
home.hiring: We're hiring and looking for joyful people to join our cookie initiative.
home.hq_careers_text: We’re hiring and looking for joyful people to join our cookie initiative.
home.menu_rotation: Each week, our menu rotates to give you 6 deliciously gourmet flavors to experience.
home.national_shipping_only: *Shipping only available in the United States
home.own_boss: Be your own boss. Become a franchisee and open your own store.
home.scan_qr: Scan the QR code to get the app today!
home.you_will_be_notified_when_this_flavor_re: You will be notified when this flavor returns
home.new_weekly_secret_menu_text: Follow the Flavor Map to discover your store's exclusive flavor!
home.based_on_the_highest_number_of_upvotes: Based on the highest number of upvotes
home.tried_this_cookie_download_the_crumbl_ap: Tried this cookie? Download the Crumbl App to write a review!
home.one_tap_order_description: The perfect variety of this week’s flavors!

jobs.about_the_job_blurb:
Crumbl is the fastest-growing cookie and dessert company in the nation and we offer a fun and inclusive work environment, where you’ll get to help us become the best brand in the nation. Plus you’ll get FREE cookies!

Applicants must be at least 16 years old, have a knack for customer service, and love cookies. Full-time and part-time positions are available and pay varies at each location. Crew members must be able to stand, walk, bend, and occasionally lift heavy items.
jobs.application_error: There was an issue submitting your application. Please try again later.
jobs.growth_opportunities_blurb: Whether you want to climb the leadership ladder at your location or eventually join the corporate team, we want to support your growth! As a baker or driver, you’ll strive to provide high-quality desserts by processing orders, balling dough, topping desserts, and occasionally driving.
jobs.job_openings_blurb: Ready to turn your love of cookies into a dream job? Fill out our application and join the Crumbl Crew today!
jobs.join_crew_blurb: Baking cookies isn’t enough. At Crumbl we strive to make the worlds best desserts and nurture the world’s best people.
jobs.love_for_crumbl: The love for Crumbl is real
jobs.not_hiring: This store is not currently hiring for any positions. Please check back later.
jobs.secret_ingredient_blurb: At Crumbl, our secret ingredient is you! Our Crumbl Crew is the heart and soul of every sweet moment. With their passion, smiles, and dedication, they truly add the perfect finishing touch to every dessert. Join today and help us in our mission of bringing friends and family together over a box of the best cookies in the world!
jobs.tell_us_about_yourself: Tell us about yourself! Why should we hire you?
jobs.testimonial1: “Literally just started working here a few weeks ago and I love it the cookies are amazing and the job is great definitely recommend getting a job there or if you do not need the job go for the cookies!”
jobs.testimonial2: “It's an amazing experience to just be a part of Crumbl and I have never had a cookie till I started working here and I swear these are some of the best cookies ever and it is worth the money. Can never go wrong with the chocolate chip cookie.”
jobs.testimonial3: “I have only been working here for two weeks, but the cleanliness and professionalism of the staff as well as the friendly faces and outstanding customer service deserve to be raved about. I’ve never seen such dedicated owners of a company in my life; they really care about their customers and keep their satisfaction at the top of the Crumbl priorities list.”

catering.catering_blurb: Transform every occasion into a sweet celebration. Just select your nearest store and schedule your order in a few clicks.
catering.choose_flavors_blurb:
Treat your guests to a delectable assortment from our weekly menu! Choose from our rotating flavors of Mini or Large cookies. Starting with orders of 48, you can add increments of 12 to customize your selection perfectly.

Additional flavors may be offered each week by your local store. Contact your store directly to learn more!
catering.gallery_blurb: Follow the instructions printed on your receipt to pick up your order and you're all set! Don’t forget to snap some pics at your event and tag us—we can’t wait to see the fun!
catering.order_today_blurb: Place an order today and choose your favorite Mini or Large cookies in either a 48-Pack or 96-Pack. Enjoy your delicious treats, ready for pickup in as little as 90 minutes.
catering.planning_blurb: Need more cookies? Place an order in advance and make your event a hit! Whether it's a birthday bash, corporate event, or family reunion, we've got you covered with a variety of flavor options tailored for your gatherings.
catering.schedule_ahead_blurb: Need more cookies? Place an order in advance and make your event a hit! Whether it's a birthday bash, corporate event, or family reunion, we've got you covered with a variety of flavor options tailored for your gatherings. Enjoy the best experience with our award-winning app.
catering.weekly_rotating_flavors_blurb:
Treat your guests to a delectable assortment from our weekly menu! Choose from our rotating flavors of Mini or Large desserts. With our expansive menu of 300+ weekly rotating flavors, Crumbl will always be a fun, exciting, and sweet surprise for any occasion.

Additional flavors may be offered each week by your local store. Contact your store directly to learn more!
catering.white_glove_services_blurb:
Need help with large orders, catering, or bulk gift cards? We're excited to offer a white glove service tailored specifically for large orders and business needs—whether it's catering, coordinating deliveries from multiple locations, or sending bulk gift cards to employees or clients.

Our B2B Specialists are here to help at 888.594.0025 — Monday through Friday, 9 am–4 pm MT.
